title: 21 Feel-Good Feline Funnies for Your Morning Mood Booster
description: The middle of the week is here and that means it is time to celebrate with some pawsitive energy. And what better delivery mechanism for such energy than the rarely witnessed pawsitivty of cats. Known to usually be rather judgmental, juvenile and jealous creatures, joy is not often an emotion that we associate with our crazy cat children.But that is also what makes their joy so much more special and sweet when it does eerily rear its head after not being used for an extended period of time. Which is why we captured as much of that unbridled joy as we could and put it into this list of feel good feline funnies that will make a marvelous morning mood booster for all you hoomans who had a hard time getting into the office this morning.
author: Laurent Shinar
excerpt: 21 Feel-Good Feline Funnies for Your Morning Mood Booster - World's largest collection of cat memes and other animals
text: Purrfect proof that self-care to make you feel good extends beyond the boundaries of species. This clever catto saw an opportunity to take part in a wellness ceremony and dove in. you have to commend this feline for being so self-aware and wanting to take part in healing practices. This is one of those moments when you might feel deflated for a moment that the bill you found on the floor is not physically worth as much as you had hoped. But then upon looking closely at the bill, you come to realize that it is more than you could have ever wanted in your life.
html:
Purrfect proof that self-care to make you feel good extends beyond the boundaries of species. This clever catto saw an opportunity to take part in a wellness ceremony and dove in. you have to commend this feline for being so self-aware and wanting to take part in healing practices.

This is one of those moments when you might feel deflated for a moment that the bill you found on the floor is not physically worth as much as you had hoped. But then upon looking closely at the bill, you come to realize that it is more than you could have ever wanted in your life.
